title: Hypothesis Testing
text: By the null hypothesis that the variances are the same. Let s denote the standard deviations. The F statistic is $$\frac{{s_1}^2}{{s_2}^2}$$.

title: Test of Two Variables
text: Student 1's standard deviation is 38.1, and student 2's standard deviation is 22.5. Divide student 1's variance with student 2's variance.
